title: Using Eroge Abilities In Real Life
description: "It'd be so fun to live in a real eroge world..." After being exempt from military service, Lee Jinseok enjoyed playing an 'eroge' in the meantime. Then one day abilities from the eroge were transferred to him in the real world?! ""As long as I have this ability, I can make anyone mine!"
author: Whale Flavored Candy, kortoon & F.W.
